website_summaries.verdict: This bath thermometer can double as a room temperature device.
pros: Has an automatic shutoff after 30 minutes
Holds up well, even when dropped
Checks both room and bath temperature
Also comes in a duck and a turtle shape
cons: Other bath thermometers read more often

customer_reviews.title: 5 years later still working great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in 2013, now 5 years later it is still working great. Changed the batteries once. Update: Finally broke, 5 years 7 months. One set of batteries. Buying another
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Good  Ducky...until it died =(
customer_reviews.text: I love this duck. It makes me confident in the bath water temp. It also makes it to where I can set it to a similar temperature every bath. The only not think I would say is a bit wonky is that if the temperature is to low it turns green... You would think it would be blue for too cold green for just right and red for too hot. But that is easy to deal with. Updated 5-30-2016 - I loved this duck until it stopped working after 5 months. I replaced the batteries and it worked for one bath. Now I have a duck that doesn't even squeak :(
customer_reviews.author: LFG

customer_reviews.title: Love it.... Only worked for a month :(
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved my crocodile.... Sadly this broke after one month of use. I took care, as other reviews advised, and only used it for checking temperature then removed it from the bath. I did not let my son play with it for fear of submerging it for long periods of time and it breaking. Well... It broke anyway. Based on the reviews this product truly is hit or miss for longevity and mine was a miss. I would purchase a different/ more reliable product unless you really want a crocodile and are willing to gamble with it's longevity.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLvr87

customer_reviews.title: Defective in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: We used the thermometer several times and it seemed to work great. Then today it was reading 120 degrees and even when we ran it under cold water, the temp started to go down but then went right back up. Cute but it makes for an expensive toy which is all you are left with when the thermometer doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: B. Espitia

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Fun
customer_reviews.text: We love our bath thermometer so much we ordered a second one for Grandma's house. As much as we love it for the temperature part, my daughter loves to play with it too. My only complaint is the batteries died after about a year of use and they were about 1/3 of the price of the toy to start with. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Cadabby

customer_reviews.title: We don't take a bath without it!
customer_reviews.text: Accurate temperature readings and I just love it! I've read blogs saying these aren't necessary, but we literally don't take a bath without it. My sons love playing with the duck and it's so useful to make sure baby is at a warm enough temperate without it being too hot. Put this with some lavender baby shampoo and you have yourself a perfect baby shower gift :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hynes

customer_reviews.title: Cute but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I got this to give my infant a comfortable bath temperature. It worked for a month then it was sporadic in turning on. Here we are less than two months later and the thing doesn't turn on. I don't know if this is a bad battery or poor design. There is no off button so once on it stays on for 30 min. After our 10 min bath it stays on taking the temp of the room. Don't really need that as we have central heat and air so I already know what the temp of my house is. This could be improved with an off button or to only turn on when in water.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Dreambaby Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the crocodile dreambaby thermometer for my newborn baby. I had a different brand when my son was born but it had since died. I am a bad judge of whether water it too hot or too cold, so this type of product is a must. It works well. It flashes green if it's too cold and red if it's too hot. It also digitally displays the temputare. My toddler loves it and I think it will last a long time. It is easy to use and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent while it works...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my second baby and choose it because my older son, who is 4 yo, wanted to help in the bath time of his little brother so I thought the indicator light on this thermometer would be awesome. It was wonderful, but JUST WORKED FOR 7 WEEKS! My husband changed the batteries but nothing. I opened it thinking maybe the water run into it, but NO, just stop working. I definitely no recommend it, it's a shame because was awesome while it last. Now I have to look for another one, different.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Aburto Varela

customer_reviews.title: Helps with bathtime
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting the bath temp right. We had the ducky that turns white when it's hot, but we were keeping the water too cool out of caution. With this we were able to warm up the water with a better idea of the temperature. Baby enjoys bathtime a lot more now!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new moms and dads!
customer_reviews.text: This was a quick purchase for my daughter after giving her first baby a bath. She was worried that the water had been too hot. (It was not) A friend told me about this and I immediately bought it that night! It works well!
customer_reviews.author: South Dakota farmer's wife

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The cover for the battery didn’t push the battery back all the way so that it was seated correctly to power the thermometer, so I put a little piece of plastic between the battery and the cover and that seemed to work. I used it once and then it wouldn’t turn on again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No way to turn off
customer_reviews.text: Batteries die super quick because there is no way to turn off the thermometer when you’re finished using. It works but not for long and doesn’t take a typical battery type. We threw out and bought a different kind.
customer_reviews.author: themartinbirds

customer_reviews.title: Love this device!
customer_reviews.text: This duck simultaneously makes me and my kid happy. She loves playing with it in the bath and I love being able to get an up-to-second read of her water temperature. It's great, set it and forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A must have. I use it every time I draw a bath for our baby. It’s just reassuring to know the temperature, so bath time can be made into something fun. I also like that it keeps checking the temperature during bath time, so I know we need to wrap things up when the temp gets too low. Even my mother in law asks if I “brought the ducky” when she babysits at her house.
customer_reviews.author: what

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product that gives quick and accurate temperature measurements
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product that gives quick and accurate temperature measurements. I'm sure when the baby gets older it will make for a great bath toy too. The automatic shut off is excellent feature as well. Highly recommended product for any new parent.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Used once and won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: Literally used once and won't turn on now. Screw for battery replacement is even smaller than a watch screw and I have no way to open product to see if batteries are dead
customer_reviews.author: Roland Hubert III

customer_reviews.title: This was great the first time we used it and then after ...
customer_reviews.text: This was great the first time we used it and then after working great the first time, it started sporadically working. It will come on at random times without turning it on and other times it won't come on when we push the on button. It's really cute and I wanted it to work, but it's going to be a bath toy rather than a thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The duck works
customer_reviews.text: The duck works. I use it in the bath water before bathing my puppy. The flashing light is a good indicator of safe vs not safe. The temperature screen is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: My baby was born on November 18. Take a bath, we started three weeks later. Thermometer stopped working, on January 10. We are very disappointed and dissatisfied. We tried to change the batteries, but the thermometer still does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Zhukova

customer_reviews.title: Great for bath time!
customer_reviews.text: This has been really helpful for our twins. Since we do one bath and then the other, this helps us make sure the water doesn’t get too cold for the second baby!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a month and love it. It tells me the actual temperature so I can make the water the same temperature each time at my baby's favorite temperature. It reads the temperature for 30 minutes and automatically shuts off. The light blinks green if it's too cold and red if it's too hot, but the light only works if the duck is in the water. If it's out of the water, the thermometer still works, just the lights don't turn on and off, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to get this cute little alligator so my husband could get our child’s bath ready with confidence of the water temperature. However, we haven’t even had the item for a month and it’s already stopped working. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: lynz_eee

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this crocodile!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the bath on a daily basis for my toddler and have used this brand thermometer since he was born. We keep his bath temp between 93-97 F.The crocodile is sturdier and heavier and better quality than the duck. These thermometers are disposable and ruin after 6 months because of condensation and water seeping inside the battery cover. I'm on my third one in the past 18 months so prepare yourself to purchase more in the future. All in all, a great purchase that we can't live without.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working - 3 times
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month of use. Third one we’ve tried that has stopped working. First one lasted 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Use in my soaker tub
customer_reviews.text: Using in an adult soaker tub to fill to the correct temperature and saves so much hassle. BIG soaker tub that can easily be too hot. Then I have to wait while adding more cold water. This is perfect and cute in my spa bathroom
customer_reviews.author: nlkflint

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think it’s accurate
customer_reviews.text: I doubt this duck is accurate because it says that I like my baths at 108 degrees! I feel like that’s a little outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Really liked...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this thermometer, because what is a good temperature for the baby seems cold to me. Unfortunately, it only lasted 3 months. I bought replacement batteries, but it still will not come on. I believe it's broken...It did make setting my baby's bath water to a good temperature easy. My little nephews loved it when they came to visit, so I bought them one as well. I wonder how long theirs will last...will keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Cute and worked well for a bit. But broke after about 3 weeks! Not the best quality clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: not very durable. but maybe my fault.
customer_reviews.text: I took it on a trip and packed in my check baggage. Screen cracked. Before that nice to have a number for the bath temp. As new parents we were very paranoid.In the end we just turned the water heater down to 120 (I highly recommend this). Now it is much easier to adjust the bath temperature.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great lil thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Measures in borh celsius and fahreinheit (i am from europe my hubby is nit so this feature is important to us) and measures water temp too. Love the blinking light green if watwr temp ok, red if too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Tijana

customer_reviews.title: Takes the guess work out of bath water temperature!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! It's been so easy to get a bath ready when we know little man likes his bath water to be between 94-88 degrees!
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Received Promptly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but, I cannot speak to much more as, it was a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great for measuring water temperature
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use gadget for measuring bath water temperature. Updates temperature every 10 seconds, which is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: christina o.

customer_reviews.title: Great for mom and baby!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best baby shower gift I gave. Mom was able to use it before baby even arrived to make sure she was taking a cool enough bath while still pregnant. Great gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra E.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for new born. Product exactly as pictured and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.author: Carol C Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out the package
customer_reviews.text: This is a new product so I expected it to work after taking it out the package. But it did not work and I had to buy batteries for it to turn on. It did come with batteries that did not work, not sure what the point of that is ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted 3 years and he loves playing with it in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice before water got in it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: it was fantastic. Gave a good reading and even a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter's baths, and while it worked, it was fantastic. Gave a good reading and even a little red light/green light to indicate temperature safety. However, the battery didn't last very long, and even when I replaced it, the thermometer still didn't work. Now she just uses it as a bath toy.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: SO IMPORTANT- add to cart!
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best things I bought for our baby. It takes all the guess work out of bath time and I can be sure the water is the right temp. Easy to see red light if it’s too hot and green light for cold. Already bought a 2nd one for my sister in-law!
customer_reviews.author: PFManning

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read but seems like not seal very well due to I can see steam on the screen inside.
customer_reviews.author: KENG JU LIN

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting our baby's bath ready. It provides a peace of mind to make sure the water temp is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer for bath time!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cute, simplistic design of this thermometer. The temperature is displayed in large, easy-to-read numbers and adjusts to changing temperatures rapidly. It also features a light warning system - green at the correct temperature range and red when the bath is too hot for baby. The thermometer can be used to read room temperature as well
customer_reviews.author: KAdams

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer & Toy
customer_reviews.text: It reads the temperature well and is durable to stay in the bath with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki G. 711

customer_reviews.title: Only works for awhile
customer_reviews.text: The alligator worked great for a 2-3 months and then stopped. I just tried to replace the battery with no luck, so another $5 wasted! I recommend you just go with common sense. Once we used this a couple of times we realized we didn't really need it to know how hot the water should be. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I bought it for me now while I am pregnant because can't have water temp too high. I will use it when the baby comes.
customer_reviews.author: tgosney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has helped me feel better about bathing my infant in warm water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must for any New Parent
customer_reviews.text: After over a year our first one finally gave out. This gator has saved us much so much time and has been accurate so far. It takes all the worrying and guessing out of wondering if the water is too hot for our daughter. I highly recommend this little gadget. Great baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unit stopped working after one month of use. Very disappointed. And yes, I replaced the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Quintin Erdman

customer_reviews.title: I got this more for my husband and grandparents than ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this more for my husband and grandparents than myself. They were worried about making baby's bath water too hot or cold, and this little ducky does the job. It has a clear temperature readout, and flashes red if the water is too hot. I have found myself using it quite a bit as well (just to be on the safe side).
customer_reviews.author: Godskid4110

customer_reviews.title: Only one complaint
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it occasionally doesn’t turn on when I want it to and sometimes it turns itself off when I still want it to be on.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great during pregnancy too!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for all my newly pregnant friends. Great for babies but I used it just as much while pregnant. Only certain temperature baths are allowed while pregnant and this is one of few ways that is safe to relax, know the precise temp gives you piece of mind. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after 1 mouth. Also drain the batteries very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Oxygen

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: Liked it, but it rusted after 3 months of use (little prongs on the bottom) and always seemed to take foe er to get the temp. And if baby moved it the temp would change. Good for the first few months with a nervous mommy, but I can just judge the temp for baby's bath on my own now
customer_reviews.author: J's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Every mother should own this ducky
customer_reviews.text: I never bathe my newborn without this little ducky. It makes monitoring the bath water worry-free. I will always give this item as a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip

customer_reviews.title: Alligator Thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Had something similar for my babies, so I knew it had to be on the Internet somewhere and, of course, Amazon had it! We use it for every bath and our great-granddaughter loves to play with it! Keeps accurate temperature readings.
customer_reviews.author: Juanice Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Cute & double useful
customer_reviews.text: I guess you don't really need a thermometer because you can feel the water with your hand, but it's nice to have backup when you are a worrier. What I wasn't expecting is that the baby LOVES playing with it. This makes the whole bath time experience so much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: NMT

customer_reviews.title: in the room it has an annoying design that you have to pick it up and ...
customer_reviews.text: it works well in the water..... in the room it has an annoying design that you have to pick it up and turn it over to start it. if that button were on the top it would have got 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: MrW

customer_reviews.title: When we first got this little ducky it worked great! However after just a few weeks of occasional ...
customer_reviews.text: When we first got this little ducky it worked great! However after just a few weeks of occasional use water had leaked into the display and batteries are dead. It was quite the operation to remove the batteries (2 - LR44 batteries). At this point I am going to look around for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Suprr cute and eliminates the guess work for baby bathwater. I just wish it had an off button.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is very versatile. We use it to test the temperature of our nursery and the baby's bath water. It's easy to transport from room to room and easy to operate as well. Would recommend to parents who want to be sure that they are keeping their little one in a comfortable environment.
customer_reviews.author: SausalitoShopper

customer_reviews.title: A Solution for Bath Temperature
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very particular about the temperature of his bath water. His caregiver asked me to get a thermometer that would work in water. First I selected one that is just lowered into the water, but it didn't work well. So I hunted for one for babies, and found this one which is perfect. It requires almost nothing of the user. You just stick it on top of the water and it registers. Thanks Dreambaby!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Peterzell

customer_reviews.title: You're the one
customer_reviews.text: I love my thermometer ducky. He's cute and does his job. Though he does float under the faucet stream sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Grayce Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had a 4moms bathtub which my little one grew out if so was nervous about getting temp right now that she is getting bathed in the sink. This works great. I find it to be very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Williams

customer_reviews.title: I see use leaking from the battery compartment leading me to think there was a bad manufacturing seal
customer_reviews.text: Been using it since October (3.5months) and it stopped working already. I see use leaking from the battery compartment leading me to think there was a bad manufacturing seal.
customer_reviews.author: Wing Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby baths
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves to,play with her croc daughter n the bath. We have had it for a few months now and no problems. It reads the bath temp and also air temp if you turn it on manually. Great must have for baby baths
customer_reviews.author: Raven the MavenTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: We never give our daughter a bath without this handy ...
customer_reviews.text: We never give our daughter a bath without this handy tool! She enjoys playing with the alligator, and I have the peace of mind knowing that the water is not too hot or cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jesynia Rondina

customer_reviews.title: It's handy and quite convenient. The only problem is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's handy and quite convenient. The only problem is it takes sometime before the degree finalizes and you have to wait.
customer_reviews.author: pinkpiggy23

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it's working. Very easy to use and automatically turned off. However it has stopped working just four month later from purchase. It can't be replaced or returned.
customer_reviews.author: junk buyer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This simple product is great. It flashes if the water is too hot or cold and has the actual temp on the readout on its back. My little one loves to play with it during the bath time and it takes the stress out of bath water temp. Especially if others may be bathing your child.
customer_reviews.author: mjc

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: this duck is so cute, I was worried after reading reviews that it would stop working but I have for 3 months now and it works great. You can set hot limit when red light turns on and it's great to play with
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate! My son loves taking a bath and doesnt cry anymore. All thanks to this thermometer
customer_reviews.author: Paola Lorido

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working quickly
customer_reviews.text: Total bummer but it only worked about 5-6 times and now it will not turn on. Loved it while it lasted, but it should last more than a few baths.
customer_reviews.author: Wooty

customer_reviews.title: works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it and my kid throws it around and it can with stand the abuse. Great product even got one for my in laws, great first baby gift!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Loved this while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Loved this while it worked, but it quit working after a few months and replacing the batteries didn't bring it back to life.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good, I like it. but in Walmart I saw cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Alfiya

customer_reviews.title: Helpfuk product
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and seems to be accurate. Have not had any issues with this product. Very helpful for determining bath temp.
customer_reviews.author: MJJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I especially love how it gives you the actual temperature of the water you put it in instead of just a red or green light.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Corbitt

customer_reviews.title: Practical and fun
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun and works very well. I can't imagine not using a thermometer for baby's bath as I get paranoid with water temp. This product is great. Gives you temperature in celsius also if needed.
customer_reviews.author: tomatomozzarella

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It worked great - until it stopped working. We've had it for less than a year and it was great until recently. It started getting temperamental - not switching on for a while after being put in water, and then not switching off. Changed the battery and it still is switching on erratically.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella

customer_reviews.title: Cute and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Safe and reliable way to test out bath water temp - love it and oh so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mom To Twins

customer_reviews.title: battery life not good
customer_reviews.text: did not like the fact that the battery did not last more than a couple of months the last one I had lasted a couple of years!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M Zirngible

customer_reviews.title: Helped a ton!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I could never agree on the temperature for our little man's baths. This has made bath time much more pleasant!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: We love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: We love this little guy. after a year of use he is suffering and misreading the temp but we will replace him with the same product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hazlewood

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! Our first one lasted two years before ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Our first one lasted two years before our toddler sank it...literally. It gave us a temperature sanity check for hundreds of baths so we bought another one. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My son loves the croc design. I just wish there was an off button instead of auto shut off. But can replace battery if need to.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Battery impossible to change
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year the battery died and we couldn't get the screw holding the battery cover in place off. We tried to contact their customer service and did not hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Loebl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not even 3 months old, and it no longer works...
customer_reviews.author: Jenn G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Made this nervous new mom a lot more at ease. Very easy to use. Acts as a temperature reader and a toy!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Does not really work
customer_reviews.text: Its a super cute thermometer but does not really work as it only takes the temperature from the surface which typically is much colder than the rest. I always have to use another thermometer to really test the water but again, it's cute and swims.
customer_reviews.author: SuHe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works super easy. The cons after months of use don't work due the battery can no be changed
customer_reviews.author: Ma

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: It tells the right Temperature for my baby Tub time.
customer_reviews.author: Akiko Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month and now it will only work when it wants to...which isn't often.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer works well so far (2.5 months after purchase). It hasn't fogged up like other thermometers we've gotten. I also love the alligator design.
customer_reviews.author: JLBRBB

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect gift for baby showers I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gift for baby showers I love it .... and its good for the mom too
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Makes my life easier when checking the water temperature as a fill the tub!
customer_reviews.author: CMSUAREZ

customer_reviews.title: Works, Fun toy, but moisture under screen
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and baby loves it as a toy, but some moisture does appear under screen.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my daughter who had twins. She liked so much and always uses it, that I bought another one for my niece who is expecting the end of May. I like that it takes both the water and room temperatures, and that it changes every 10 seconds. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Gert Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Fun floating thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thermometer. It turns on automatically when it hits water and it just floats around. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gem-mama

product_meta.title: Dreambaby Room and Bath Thermometer - Green Croc
product_meta.description: Color:Green CrocGetting the temperature just right for your child can be tricky, and sometimes hand-testing water isn’t always the best method. That’s why we created the baby-safe Dreambaby Crocodile Room & Bath Thermometer. It takes the guesswork out of bath time, adds a flare of fun to the tub, and ensures that your baby’s sensitive skin can be kept safe from harsh temperatures. Cute enough to be your child’s favorite toy and durable enough to be your new best friend, this thermometer is also BPA-free and tested to the EN71 Standard, ensuring absolute safety. It gives accurate digital temperature readings in Celsius or Fahrenheit that automatically update every 10 seconds. It also features a 30 minute automatic shut off to help preserve the battery lifespan. When used in water it also has a red indicator light for when the water is too hot and a green indicator light for when the water is too cool. In addition to being used in the tub, the Dreambaby Room & Bath Thermometer can also be placed in your baby’s room to confirm the current temperature of the room and will offer the same reliable temperature readings as in the tub. This is perfect for making adjustments to your central thermostat and enduring that your baby’s room is kept at the right temperature. Best of all, the Dreambaby Room & Bath Thermometer includes batteries so you can use it right out of the pack! Don’t worry about getting the thermometer wet—it can be safely submerged in water, making it an adorable way to ensure your baby’s bath and room are at the perfect temperature every second
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT TEMPERATURE – Getting the temperature just right for your child can be tricky. Sometimes hand-testing water isn’t always the best method, which is why we created the baby-safe Room & Bath Thermometer. It takes the guesswork out of bath time, adds a flare of fun to the tub, and ensures that your baby’s sensitive skin can be kept safe from harsh temperatures

SAFE, FAST, AND ACCURATE – While this thermometer is cute enough to be your child’s favorite toy, it’s durable enough to be your new best friend. BPA-free and tested to the EN71 Standard, this absolutely safe device gives accurate digital temperature readings that automatically update every 10 seconds. This saves you hassle and you can then have complete control to adjust your baby’s bathwater to the temperature you want it to be

COLOR CODED INDICATOR – Alongside its precise temperature readings, when used in water the Dreambaby Thermometer features a red indicator light for when the water is too hot and a green indicator light for when the water is too cool. It can also give temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit!

ALSO READS ROOM TEMPERATURES – In addition to being used in the tub, the Dreambaby Thermometer can also be placed in your baby’s room, where it will offer the same reliable temperature readings as in the tub. This is perfect for making adjustments to your central thermostat and ensuring that your baby’s room is kept at the right temperature

BATTERIES INCLUDED – The Dreambaby Room & Bath Thermometer includes batteries so you can use it right out of the pack! In addition, it features a 30 minute automatic shut off to help preserve the battery lifespan Don’t worry about getting the thermometer wet—it can be safely submerged in water, making it an adorable way to ensure bath time is less stressful and more enjoyable!

specifications.Safety warning: Dreambaby® Bath & Room Thermometer is a safe, easy and fun way to monitor the temperature of both the baby's room and bath. It is a fun bath toy, rechecks the temperature every 10 seconds and automatically switches off after 30 seconds to save energy.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars712 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
